excerpt: "SALT LAKE CITY, Sept. 21, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- Measured Analytics and Insurance (\"Measured\"), the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered cyber insurance provider, today announced that it has joined the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cyber Insurance Partner Initiative to simplify the process for AWS customers to get a quote for cyber insurance coverage."
